note: 🎨 Artist ✨ 🏳️‍🌈 Queer 💋 🍃 Weed Snob 💨 🌲PNW born + raised 🥾  🍄 Nature explorer 🌈 🐕🐾 Dog mom 🐾🦴 ✨ Intersectionality exists - become aware of your own privilege ✨ “Intersectionality is the acknowledgement that everyone has their own unique experiences of discrimination and oppression and we must consider everything and anything that can marginalise people – gender, race, class, sexual orientation, physical ability, etc."  Be better.
